package.name: StockX
package.shortDescription: All Apple Wallpapers, All in one place

descriptionlist.description: All Apple wallpapers from the iPhone 6S though to the 2020 SE
Compatible with iPhone X running iOS 13.0 and above!

WARNING: This Package replaces system files! Everything is backed up, and files are restored when uninstalled. However, I don't take responsibility for this package damaging your iPhone should anything go wrong.

changelog.change: Added iPhone 11 Preview to iPhone X and XS
